title: Community
text: We host a community space for palaeobiologists using the Google Groups platform. This space provides an area to share ideas and resources, advertise opportunities, and network with colleagues in an informal setting. Questions related to palaeoverse packages are also more than welcome. This space is unmoderated, but please be kind to others. We reserve the right to remove anyone harrasing individuals.

title: Community
text:
Twitter



We are active on Twitter, where we share updates and news on Palaeoverse, as well as resources for the Palaeobiology community. We are also more than happy to help circulate relevant news you wish to share with the community, just remember to tag @ThePalaeoverse and use the hashtag #palaeoverse.

title: R Packages
text:
sepkoski
sepkoski provides access to Sepkoski’s fossil marine animal genera compendium (Sepkoski, 2002). The aim of the package is to offer a light and easily-accessible solution to working with Sepkoski’s compendium to support teaching exercises. Go to site…

title: Welcome to Palaeoverse
text: Palaeoverse is an initiative which aims to bring the palaeobiology community together to share resources, reach agreed standards, and improve reproducibility in palaeobiological research.

title: Welcome to Palaeoverse
text:
R Packages
Tools for the community to help streamline analyses and improve code readability and reproducibility.

title: Welcome to Palaeoverse
text:
Directory
Online community database of research labs, upcoming conferences, workshops, and vacancies around the world.

title: Welcome to Palaeoverse
text:
GrantTrack
Online community database of research funding schemes and grants for Palaeobiologists.

title: Welcome to Palaeoverse
text:
Google Group
A community space for palaeobiologists to share ideas and resources, advertise opportunities, and network with colleagues in an informal setting.

title: GrantTrack
text: An important note: we strive to make sure all the data here is up-to-date and accurate. However, please always check official information via funders’ websites. We hold no responsibility for missed deadlines.

title: Resources
text: The palaeoverse package cheat sheet is designed to make your life easier when working with the package. It serves as a quick look-up guide on the functionality available, grouped by relevant categories. From time to time, we will add additional cheat sheets for packages from the Palaeoverse development team, and update current ones as packages evolve.

title: Resources
text:
GrantTrack



GrantTrack is an online community database of research funding schemes and grants for Palaeobiologists. This framework is provided to support the community in easily keeping track of upcoming and available funding opportunities. To contribute to the database, please complete the following submission form.

title: Palaeoverse Directory
text:
Welcome to the Palaeoverse Directory! This resource is provided to promote the communication of upcoming conferences, workshops, and vacancies. It also provides a register of research labs and their research focus. We hope that this resource will foster networking and collaboration across the globe.
If you wish to register an upcoming conference, workshop, vacancy or your lab, please complete the submission form.
Posts shared here do not imply endorsement from the Palaeoverse team and we can hold no responsibility for any interactions you make via this service. If you face any issues or have any concerns about current postings, please contact a member of the Palaeoverse team.
